>
[Crossbow Crack Shot](/Feats.aspx?ID=3156) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gunslinger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=406" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Guns & Gears](/Sources.aspx?ID=98) pg. 111 <sup>2.0</sup>

</column>

---

You’re exceptionally skilled with the [crossbow](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=17). The first time each round that you Interact to reload a crossbow you are wielding, including Interact actions as part of your slinger’s reload and similar effects, you increase the range increment for your next Strike with that weapon by 10 feet and deal 1 additional precision damage per weapon damage die with that Strike. If your crossbow has the [backstabber](/Traits.aspx?ID=544) trait and you are attacking an [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) target, instead of the normal benefits of this feat backstabber deals 2 additional precision damage per weapon damage die in place of its normal effects.
name: Crossbow Crack Shot
